sheet.name: en
sheet.text: I know the fate of the world is at stake...
And I'm definitely worried about my friends and everyone else...
Gu~gugugu gugugu gugu! GU! Gu? Gugugu!
Heh, yeah. You really get me, you know.
Anyway, there are some things I just don't see going well.
Like... imagine if Schezo and Rulue actually needed help really badly.
Then imagine if I told them I was worried about them.
They'd be up in arms! "How dare you assume we can't defend ourselves!?"
They take that kinda stuff WAY too seriously!
Who is this creeper you speak of, Arle?
Do you appear out of thin air when people say the word "creeper"?
What I meant to say was, "I just want you to confirm something"!
Yeah, yeah. I know, I know.
Ridiculous things slip out of your mouth whenever you're super focused.
Honestly, it'd be weird if you DIDN'T say those things. That's just classic Schezo.
I'm working really hard to fix this bad habit...
I'll be on top of this soon enough!
I'll even be on top of you, too!
I-I meant to say, "I'll rise to the top and claim victory over you"!
Never seen anyone mangle words that badly.
In a way, it's a real talent!
You meant to say, "I shall have victory, and you will pay!" Right?
But that's beside the point! Come, let's do this!
We did it! Victory for us~!
If you hadn't distracted me, the outcome would've been different!
You said you wanted to confirm something with me. Is that the distraction you're talking about?
Right! That's the whole reason I was looking for you.
Tch! She's caught up to us already.
Schezo! What a pleasant surprise running into you here.
The adorable, strong, and dangerously intelligent Witch!
Just keep watching. You'll see soon enough.
Oh-hohoho! Submit to me! You know you want to!
I didn't know you two were...
I can't explain why I feel so desperate.
We'll have ourselves an endless Puyo battle.
Then I can completely indulge myself in sweet, "fun" victory!
Did Witch always talk like this?
She's been chasing me around for a while now!
I believe some sort of power has taken over her.
You always seem to be at the epicenter of trouble.
That's what I wanted to confirm with you.
I'm not ALWAYS at the center of trouble...
At any rate, Witch is definitely acting weird.
I wonder if this is the danger Ringo and the others were talking about...
So you do know something, Arle!
Enjoying your little chat over there, you two?
Well, if you're not coming to me, then I'll come to you!
We'll talk when this is over!
Finally! Time to have a little fun. ♪
Have you come to your senses, Witch?
I feel funny... Like a bunch of clouds and webs were just sucked out of my ears.
Hm... It seems like she's back to normal.
Ever since I met that girl...
I felt like I had to keep battling and battling.
That was all I could think about up until a minute ago.
This might be more serious than we thought!
But it seems like you're quite involved in all this.
Involved? If by involved, you mean dragged into it, then yeah.
You can tell us if something's wrong, Arle.
In fact... You know what this is the perfect time for?
Some of my special witch's brew to put your mind at ease... ♪
...You didn't think to use that on yourself earlier?
Oh, shut up! What's your problem!?
How 'bout I fill you in on what's been going on.
A mysterious girl and merged dimensions... Huh.
This girl, the one who may be the culprit behind these events...
A girl I've never seen before suddenly appeared one day.
She challenged me to a Puyo Puyo battle, laughing all the while.
She was quite powerful, but I still managed to best her.
And before I knew it, she was gone.
Guess you don't call yourself a dark mage for nothing.
Though I can't really say that in this case.
I feel she may have gone easy on me in our battle.
It seemed as if it was simply an excuse for her to measure my abilities.
That sounds just like what happened to me!
Yeah, and she told me something right before she left.
She said I still had a long way to go, and she told me I need to be more "fun."
Right after she said that, I started feeling strange.
I haven't been taking this seriously enough.
If this girl's gonna go around forcing everyone to battle...
You said it! Even I'm upset, and it takes a LOT to upset me!
*scoff* This is a waste of my time...
...is what I'd say if I didn't care.
But I do care. She's threatening to upend my quiet way of life.
And I won't sit around doing nothing while that happens.
If you're going after her, then count me in.
Is that Schezo and Witch I see?
...archnemesis of Lady Rulue, queen of martial arts!
Rulue, now's not the time to—
Well, then. How about a more formal greeting?
Like with a Puyo Puyo battle!?
Unless this is just your feeble attempt to escape!
What are you waiting for!? Let's battle!
Next time you won't be so lucky, Arle! Mark my words!
Do you feel okay? Are you hurt? Can you think straight?
And I'm always at my peak performance!
So you don't feel like you were forced to battle me?
Of course not! I battled you because I wanted to!
Seeing them all mixed in like that.
Schezo, why is Arle acting so strangely?
And what happened to me sounds just like what happened to you, Schezo.
I was somewhat curious about her identity...
But I never would've imagined how troublesome of a child she'd be.
The Dark Prince and I will not allow her to run amok!
I forgot about the Dark Prince!
I'm sure the Dark Prince is fully informed on what's going on.
I wonder where he is right now.
You're going to look for the Dark Prince...?
Then I'll do you a favor and assist you!
Oh, please. I knew you'd involve yourself the moment you heard the Dark Prince's name.
We know how you are, so cut the patronizing tone.
This is our home! Welcome to Primp Town!
It's the most wonderful place there is! Relax, unwind, and go have a good time!
Lemres, what the heck happened here?
I think it'll be quicker just to see for yourselves.
It looks like your friends have gotten caught up in this mess.
They might be in trouble right this second!?
...I hate to say it, but it's probably likely.
Oh no, oh geez, oh boy...
When I saw what was happening, I wanted to help, but there was nothing I could do.
There were just... too many of them.
Think you could take a look around and help our friends?
I've got a special project for you two.
All of this is originating from someplace, but I haven't pinpointed exactly where yet.
I need your help finding that out.
Or at least I wish I could...
What I mean is I can't say I know you very well, Lemres.
I need to know if I can really believe what you're saying.
How do I know you're someone I can trust?
As a gesture of goodwill, help yourself to all the pudding, éclairs, and chocolate you can eat.
None of those strike your fancy? Well, I can think of one other thing that might...
I like where this is going.
I was hoping you'd say that.
Shall we have a Puyo Puyo battle?
Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
So do you trust me now or what?
Right... Yes, I suppose you seem like a trustworthy person.
Though I'm still interested in how you know who I am...
But now's not the time for that.
All right. Amitie, Arle, can I—
Look at them, already off to a head start. So reliable, so determined.
We better get a move on, too. Shall we?
You're capable of so much. Much more than anyone else.
I know you can be "fun"... Isn't that right, comet warlo—
I said wakey wakey, salmon steaky!
Well, aren't you lookin' saltier than seaweed!
You won't sail far if you keep starin' off into space!
Get up on your feet and move to the beat! I wanna see you ravin' and wavin' those noodly fins!
Were you the one who was calling out to me earlier?
You betta believe it, baby! Suketoudara knows when to call ya!
Something tells me it definitely wasn't you.
Hush your crab trap! That's suckerfish talk, ya dig?
Now you're gonna watch me get my groove on, and you're gonna like it! Carpiche!?
Right on, fish fry! Let's get jivin' with a Puyo battle!
*stylish grunt* That was about as fun as steppin' on a sea urchin!
I know you're quite the lively fellow.
But were you always THIS lively?
Hey, hey, HEY! This torpedo's been launched, and it ain't slowin' down!
I'm not getting through to you at all, am I...?
There he goes... I wonder what that was all about.
Maybe the fish man can teach you a thing or two about fun... ♪
Now surrender your mind to me...
It's like it's creeping into my head and making me blank out.
I've got a bad feeling about this.
Maybe I should go check on the others.
I need to find out what's going on.
I got here as fast as I could.
No sign of any trouble yet, though...
Maybe I'll find out more if I talk to someone.
Hey, um, uh... Are you guys okay?
Huh? What kind of way is that to greet us?
Hello, friends! You guys are DEFINITELY my friends, right!?
Lidelle, you're so sweet and nice.
Raffina, you're such a hard worker, and you're always going "Ohohohoho!"
I guess what I'm trying to say is... Are you both still yourselves!?
Amitie... Is there something you're not telling us?
Lidelle! Did something happen to her!?
I can't think of anything more fun than Puyo Puyo battles...
We can do this for all eternity! You have no problem with that, right?
Raffina's been acting a bit strange today...
I admit, Raffina can play hard sometimes...
But forcing me into Puyo battles?
She's never done something like this before...
What can I say? It's just... fun~!
*whimper* We HAVE been at it for a while. I'm kind of exhausted...
If you're going to get in my way, then YOU will be my opponent.
We'll have ourselves a ball... with a Puyo Puyo battle! HA!
Okay, Raffina! Are you going to listen to me now?
How strange. I feel oddly refreshed somehow.
Earlier, it was almost as if...
I needed to battle with every fiber of my being. I couldn't help it.
Raffina! You're back to your old self again!
I'm so sorry... I must've been making you miserable.
Why was I acting like that?
I-It's fine! As long as you're okay now!
That's all that really matters, right? *giggle*
You appear to know what's going on here, do you not?
Kinda? I don't know all the details yet.
There's this girl who's doing awful things. She's the one causing all this.
Ringo, Arle, and I are trying to find her.
Well, then! Allow me to accompany you!
I suppose you could say that.
I want to show her exactly where toying with my pride will get her.
Now let's go! We'll teach her a lesson she won't soon forget!
*awkward chuckle* O-Okay, let's not get carried away.
I think it would be best if you stayed here.
But, but I can help, too...
Raffina's just worried about you, Lidelle.
Besides, you're super tired from all those battles, right?
...Y-You really DO care about me, don't you, Raffina?
Hmph. Maybe I do, maybe I don't.
Our battle's over... Why can't I see anything?
Oh, come now. Don't be such a downer.
I've been watching you all for a very long time.
But now, I finally get to battle you in person.
It's more fun than I ever imagined! ♪
I'd like to preserve that fun however I can...
And I know just the spell to help with that!
What are you doing to me...?
It's that so-called comet warlock who broke the spell on his own.
...Well, I'd love to stick around, but it's time for me to go. ♪
Were you just talking to someone?
That girl had some sort of dark aura surrounding her.
That's very sweet of you, Lemres.
I can tell you're worried about me.
Well, as you can see, I feel great!
My body... It's like it wants to battle... What's going on?
Feli, you have to stay vigilant.
No matter what you hear, you have to keep your mind from falling apart.
Because I fear something terrible is happening.
Just hang out here and nibble on some sweet, delicious chocolate.
First things first. I'm eating this.
But then, I'll be coming for you... *ominous giggling*
Look at the way his head is tilted to the side. He's just staring blankly at his red left hand.
Will he ever get my name right?
Raffina, I don't think now's the time...
You're right. I can beat it into him later.
Are you woozy? Head feel funny?
Isn't this the way Sig always acts?
These questions are getting us nowhere.
His answers are confusing and, quite frankly, a hassle to figure out!
Sig is just so easygoing that it's impossible to read him sometimes.
He didn't even seem to mind much when his hand turned red!
Some girl I've never seen before came by earlier wanting to battle.
My left hand's been weird ever since.
Like... it's really noisy. Practically deafening.
So, it remains to be seen whether this girl has corrupted him or not.
Are you being serious right now!?
Well, I guess there was no harm done! How do you feel now, Sig?
My left hand. It was being loud. Now it's not.
We're looking for someone, Sig. A girl.
And we sure could use your help!
My goodness, this is absolute torture. Enough, already!
Stop playing games and start following us!
Hey, um... So kind of a lot happened!
Everyone was being forced to have Puyo battles...
Yeah, that was the case everywhere I went, too.
Thankfully, a lot of them managed to snap out of it.
What about you!? What did you find out?
All right, all right. Everyone relax.
This would be a good time for us to sort out what we know so far.
She's forcing everyone to battle... But why?
Oh, by the way, we're looking for the Dark Prince.
It is I, the nobility of the night, the chaperone of the shadows, the gallant of the gloom!
The Dark Prince is at your service!
I've rushed to your aid in your time of need! ♪
Well, I didn't ask for it...
I hear you know a thing or two about the Dimensional Parasite.
For starters, the Dimensional Parasite is an absolute fool.
Her sole focus is preserving the rules that govern the worlds. She cares about little else.
All that drives her is to maintain the balance between "fun" and "order."
It manifested itself into a rather unfortunate existence.
We can't let things continue as they are now.
If we do, we'll have no choice but to face the worst possible outcome.
But with yours truly by your side, you've nothing to fear!
Now, Arly! Accept the aid of the Dark Prince!
And may your passions for me burn brighter than a thousand suns!
I can't believe I'm doing this right now...
Don't you worry about a thing! I promise I'll go easy on you!
I need your help! Let's teach this Dark Prince a lesson!
Time for a battle, Dark Prince!
How many times do I have to tell you...
I was thinking... it'd be real nice if you'd tell us where that girl is...
I suppose I could. After all, I WAS just stalling this whole time...
Almost time, isn't it, Wanderer of Worlds?
Fine work getting them caught up in that battle.
Just enough time for a distraction.
I didn't hear a peep outta you that whole time, now that I think of it...
And now, I present to you, Marle...
It's highly improbable that's her actual name.
So now what? Are you going to torture me?
W-Well, when you put it that way...
Just promise you'll stop what you're doing right now!
This doesn't need to get any worse!
If she gets away now, things are going to get very, VERY ugly...
Don't you have that creepy feeling in the pit of your stomach?
I'm saying you and I are hearing the same voices!
You hear that strange girl's voice, too, don't you?
Not sure. I was dozing off.
What were you guys talking about?
Well, I'm willing to listen if you're willing to share.
Not long ago, I met this girl I've never seen before.
Out of the blue, she challenged me to a battle.
Ever since then, every so often, I'd hear her voice...
But only for a brief moment.
Ah, b-b-b-but it COULD be just my imagination, of course!
Nothing to concern yourself over, Lemres.
Will one of you battle me right now?
Oh! Me! Me! I'll do the honors!
I don't know why you want to battle, but anything to be useful!
The latent power within you managed to repel that voice.
Wh-What does that mean? Did my book do something?
It's nothing. Don't worry about it.
Now how about some cream puffs? My way of saying thanks for the battle.
And of course, I brought enough for both of you!
Well, time for me to get going.
*chuckle* There's just something I have to look into.
But it's nothing you need to worry about.
Besides, whatever it is you're doing, I'm confident you'll succeed!
You've crossed the line from annoying to majorly annoying!
Do you know how hard I have to try just to avoid you!?
I could say the same thing about you!
H-Hey, Feli? No, no, no, no, don't cry!
And now even my book has an odd feeling to it.
This all started when we battled that girl...
Do you know what's going on here!?
Based on what we've seen, nothing seems to be okay.
Raffina and Sig are here, too?
You could say we're in a bit of a bind.
I wouldn't say no if you were to, uh, offer your assistance.
We should just leave four-eyes here, if you ask me.
Hurry up and battle me already!
Feli appears to be in the same condition I was in earlier.
Then we can't just leave her like this!
I don't know what's going on, and I don't care. If anyone stands in my way...
Then I'll destroy them! And it'll be so... FUN...
Lemres warned me to be careful, and still...
Lemres warned you!? So he knew about this!
Then does he know about the girl, too?
This is getting more and more complicated.
We've searched around Primp Magic School long enough.
Why don't we regroup with Lemres?
We can sort out what we've learned.
This is Lemres we're talking about. He'll know all the details!
I just came rushing over here when I heard you guys were in trouble.
I left without listening to any more of what Lemres had to say...
There was some serious power behind that voice...
Now here in Primp, I can sense danger lurking around the corner.
If I want to be certain, I must—
Other worlds are in danger, too! Like Ringo's!
You know you don't have to do this alone, right?
I never imagined you'd actually make an appearance.
Guess this means we're in a lot more trouble than I thought.
Then care to fill me in on what you know?
But I think I fit the bill perfectly.
You know, as the helpful, handsome, intelligent hero.
If you can beat me, I'll share what I know with you!
This is pretty much what's been going on recently!
She's merging stuff that shouldn't be merged in the first place.
I've been calling her the "Dimensional Parasite."
Huh... Looks like you're caught up in this, too.
You're trying to stop that girl, aren't you?
The Dark Prince only knows how to treat women with kindness.
You seem like the get-things-done type.
Allow me to guide you to where Arle and the others are.
From there, you'll have to get to the root of this problem.
Help Arle and the others however you can.
To thank you, can I offer you some tarts, éclairs, and mille-feuilles?
Ha! You can, and you will!
Well, because this whole thing kinda started with us.
Tell me, O wise and all-knowing comet warlock...
What exactly do you want us to do?
Wait, scratch that. First, I want you to tell us everything you know!
Well, there's still a lot I don't know myself.
But it all began when I started to get the sense that something was watching us.
That's when I learned that it wasn't a someTHING that was watching us. It was a someWHO.
And that somewho was heck-bent on plunging the world into chaos.
What in the world is she?
Well, for starters, some call her the "Dimensional Parasite."
Because she wants the Puyo Puyo and Tetris dimensions merged.
And she wants everyone to keep battling each other.
As long as that's the case, she has the potential to cause some serious damage.
Could be the reason why she's forcing everyone to battle.
You figured this all out by yourself?
Besides, some of this is just speculation.
Plus, that girl isn't dumb. She knows I've been tailing her.
And I've gotta say, she does a pretty good job of staying out of sight.
She seems to be particularly obsessed with you two.
So I figured I'd stick around with you guys.
Then maybe I'll get a chance to finally meet this Marle...
Hey-Hey-Hey! The party has ofishially started!
Well now, what's with all the shad expressions?
Where'd this barefoot fish man come from!? Or is he a... man fish?
Now, now, let's not get cod up in the deets! It's time to boogie!
Can't say I'm too shore what's goin' on.
All we can do is keep clam and have fin battlin'!
If the Dimensional Parasite "corrupts" you, then you end up like this.
You'll wander around, mindlessly challenging anyone to battle.
Is there a way to reverse it!?
But maybe battling someone who DOES know what's going on can snap him out of it.
Wooooo! Can't shake this dancin' eelin'! Yo, yellowfin!
C'mon! My hop step will totally school ya!
Let's dance! Let's battle! Water you waitin' for, skipper!?
Now what was ol' Suketoudara doin' again...?
Whatever it was, all that tenchion and anglerxiety I had...
Excellent! Looks like I was right.
If that snapped him out of it, then he must've ran into the Dimensional Parasite.
Did you happen to run into a strange girl with a crazy laugh?
MY COD! How did you know!?
Do you know which way she went?
Whale, let's sea... I think she went swimmin' on into the deep end of the woods!
Okay, let's go catch up to her!
I'm not too shoal what y'all are schemin', but good luck!
If you need me again, just say the word! Your fish is my command~!
Is the search starting to get to you?
No, it's not the search that's bugging me.
It's not knowing where to look that bothers me. It's the worst.
Yeah, I get what you mean. I'm like that, too.
It's okay, though. We'll find her.
And when we do, we'll make her tell us everything!
Especially why she's so obsessed with you and me.
I think he knows something. I bet he brought us together for a reason.
Today's the day we settle this for good!
That I, Draco Centauros, am the most beautiful girl in the universe!
And I'll prove it to you, Arle!
Um, sorry, but you've got the wrong person.
But I heard Puyo battle sounds!
I rushed over here because I thought it was Arle!
Oh, geez. Sorry to hear that. Well, see ya.
I'll take anyone at this point!
I just want to have a Puyo battle so bad... I'M LOSING MY MIND!
Yep, looks like she's been corrupted, too.
Well, I can't just leave her hanging, then!
Hey, you with the tail and the loud opinions!
I'll take you on! Now let's do this fair and square!
Well, now that you mention it...
My heart doesn't feel so wrenched up anymore.
Sounds like a win to me!
I've got a question for you.
Did you happen to run into a strange and mysterious girl?
Does this girl have an eerily frightening laugh?
Then she went further in, I think.
I'm not too sure I get what's going on...
But in any case, good luck!
Call on me if you need me!
It's my way of saying thanks for clearing my senses!
Wow, we've gone pretty deep into this forest!
He's the Wanderer of Worlds, or so he says.
He goofs around a lot, but he's tougher than he looks.
Then he'd make a perfect addition to the team!
Yeah, it's just... I'm sensing it again...
I figured you were after that girl, so I waited here for you!
About that girl, Ecolo! Do you know which way she went!?
She came, she wreaked utter havoc, and she left!
You won't find her here anymooooore~!
Hey, Ringo! Is it just me, or do I seem stranger than usual today?
Forget it! Let's battle! And you better make it fun!
Because a fun battle is ALL THAT MATTERS!
How could someone as strong as Ecolo get corrupted this easily...?
I wanted you to come and help me personally.
That's why I let myself get corrupted on purpose!
I'm aware I just met him, so forgive me if I'm being presumptuous...
How desperate do you have to be to pull something like that!?
I hate to say it, but we have no choice. We have to do as Ecolo says.
Okay, let's get this over with!
Let's have ourselves a mixed battle! ♪
Why don't I share a valuable piece of information with you?
A piece? This better be a whole CHUNK of information.
We haven't got all day! Tell us already!
Oh, gee, I wonder whose fault that is!
Anywho, let's get to the point!
Comet boy over there wasn't the only one who knew about these events before they began.
The Dark Prince also knew, and so did the Keeper of Dimensions.
We were all trying to think of ways to stop it.
So do you know what Madame Parasite's goal is?
I want you to help her.
Let's meet up with Amitie and Arle first.
Then I'll dive into the details.
They should be getting together right about now.
We should get going, too, Ringo!
I'm Tee. Pleasure to meet you.
